meanings.definition: Jagas (noun): A group of people who are responsible for guarding or protecting something.
meanings.sent1: The jagas stood watch over the treasure chest all night.
meanings.sent2: The jagas protected the village from any danger.
meanings.sent3: The jagas took their job so seriously that they guarded even the smallest of items.
meanings.sent4: The jagas were like a shield, always ready to defend.
meanings.sent5: The jagas' presence made everyone feel safe and secure.

meanings.definition: Jagas (verb): To act as a guard or protector.
meanings.sent1: She jagas the entrance to ensure no one unauthorized enters.
meanings.sent2: He always jagas his little sister when they play outside.
meanings.sent3: The cat jagas the house, making sure no mice come in.
meanings.sent4: The security guard jagas the building with diligence.
meanings.sent5: The knight jagas the castle with unwavering loyalty.
